subject: Tennis
China Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams fell behind by 5-0 in the first set against a Spanish qualifier, Silvia Soler-Espinosa, but won 13 of the next 15 games to pull out a victory in the first round of the China Open.
snippet: Serena Williams fell behind by 5-0 in the first set against a Spanish qualifier, Silvia Soler-Espinosa, but won 13 of the next 15 games to pull out a victory in the first round of the China Open.
